CREATE.INFO_SEED: Tap and swipe over this area!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_ONE: First, create a random seed for the generation of your passphrase!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_TWO: Now you have to memorize all 12 words of your passphrase in the right order!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_TWO_ACTION: Write down the following words separated by space and keep them secret!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_THREE: Please reenter the words of your passphrase!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_THREE_ACTION: Write down word #{{value}} and select it!
CREATE.INFO_STEP_FOUR: Please set a six-digit pin code for your account. The pin code is used to approve outgoing transactions.

IMPORT.ACTIVE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: An active account offers full functionality. You can send and receive Burstcoins. In addition, you can check your balance and see the history of your transactions.
IMPORT.ACTIVE_ACCOUNT_PIN_INFO: Please set a six-digit pin code for your account. The pin code is used to approve outgoing transactions.
IMPORT.INFO: Import an active account by entering its passphrase! Otherwise, import an offline account by entering its Burstcoin address!
IMPORT.OFFLINE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: An offline account offers the same functionality than an active account, except you cannot send Burstcoins to another address.
